aboutDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: The about command will provide you with a summary of me as well as a link to my privacy policy and my user count.

aboutSummary:
{{version}} is a bot created for [The Corner Store]({{TCS}}), with advanced moderation, utilities, and configuration. Foxxie is made to best support community servers and everything they may need to foster a healthy enviroment.

He's built on top of [Sapphire Framework](https://sapphirejs.dev/), a "plug-and-play" object-oriented-framework made for the [Discord.js library](https://discord.js.org/).

Created **{{created, fulldatetime}}** a whole **{{created, duration}} ago**. Right now he's taking care of about **{{userCount, number}} users**, with more every day!

To learn more about Foxxie and how he may process your data you can refer to our [privacy policy]({{privacy}}).
infoDescriptionUser: Show basic information about any user.
pingDescription: Runs a connection test to Discord.

pingDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: Pings my server and returns with a pong!

statsDescription: Provides some details about me and my stats.

statsDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: This command will provide details about me along with my uptime, and cpu usage.

statsMenu:
**My current statistics!**
• {{memoryPercent}}% of RAM ({{memoryUsed}} / {{totalmemory}} MB) and
• {{cpuUsage}}% of CPU ({{cpuCount}}c @ {{cpuSpeed}}GHz).
**I've been running**
• For {{uptime, duration}} on {{process}} (shard {{shard}} / {{shardTotal}})
• Using {{deps, and}}.
